resources.string: An error occurred. Please try again.
The account has been suspended. Please contact Webasyst support team in case of any questions related to billing.
This may take up to a couple of minutes…
Sign in with email and password
Open your user profile in the Webasyst\n backend in a browser and click the\n “Sign in using QR” button on the right.
Permission to the camera\n has not been granted
The code does not related to the Webasyst
Please specify your phone number to create a new Webasyst ID user profile and link it to the mobile application.

This is a wrong code! You are scanning a QR code to sign in with Webasyst ID while being authorized with another Webasyst ID already. But the code you need is located in your Webasyst backend profile on your custom domain in the Team app — this code will connect your current Webasyst ID to an new account which is not linked yet.
Link the account with your Webasyst ID…
Primary email address can not be deleted
Error: First name or last name is required
Using Webasyst already, but don’t see your accounts and data?

Most likely, your Webasyst account sign-in simply isn’t connected to your phone number. Sign in with your Webasyst ID the classic way — with an email and a password. In case of questions, follow the link below.
New private cloud workspace will be created where you and your teammates will be able to collaborate and send tasks to each other.
Sorry, we cannot create another account for you at the moment. Most likely, a limit on the number of free Webasyst cloud accounts has been exceeded.
30 days free, then from just $15.99/mo for the entire team of up to 15 users
Webasyst cloud account has been created. You can access it by opening this one-time auth url: %1$s
Link an existing Webasyst cloud account
If your Webasyst cloud account is not connected to your Webasyst ID (@{B=%s}) for some reason, ask the cloud account admin for a 8-digit invitation code @{IMG} and enter it below:
Where do I get the code?
The code can be found in the Team app > your Webasyst user profile.
Or connect by scanning a QR code in your Webasyst backend profile or by signing in the classic way — with an email and a password:
Once created, you will be able to link your custom domain name and to invite your teammates to manage cloud account together.
The invitation code is invalid.\nAsk your teammate for a new code and try again.
You have successfully signed in with Webasyst ID. But the cloud account was not connected. Please fill in your profile and try again.
New Webasyst cloud account has been successfully created!
Your Webasyst ID has been successfully connected to %1$s
Failed to create a Webasyst cloud account. Incorrect domain name.
Failed to create a Webasyst cloud account. The domain is already in use.
In order to avoid loss of contact information, Webasyst ID cannot be merged. Please contact support.
Failed to merge Webasyst ID. Please contact support.
%1$s is not installed on %2$s (API response: app_not_installed).
